name: Red5 Recorder
author: Sandeep Verma

sections.installation:
1. Copy red5recorder.php into your wordpress plugins folder, normally located in /wp-content/plugins/

  2. Login to WordPress Admin and activate the plugin

A Red5 Recorder Player can be embedded in a post using a tag of the following form:

[red5recorder:key]

You can also set global options in the Red5 Recorder option menu.
sections.description:
Red5 Recorder allows wordpress users to easily use Red5 Recorder Player on their website to record Video / Audio Streams as response and embed to website.

Please check Demo for Red5 Recoder Player here

Get fully customized Red5 Recorder Player with your own Red5 dedicated server for Website http://red5.svnlabs.com/

Linux dedicated server: You need to install RED5 Server + Java + Flex Red5 Recoder Player on your server.

Best Red5 version for Video / Audio Recording Applications

Go to -> Red5 HOME (/usr/local/red5) -> Open file build.properties -> red5.version=0.9.0

Red5 Cam Recorder More Skins

Support

We do provide Paid HELP ABOUT RED5, JAVA, installation or configuration. For support please visit …
http://red5.svnlabs.com/
https://www.facebook.com/Red5streaming
http://blog.svnlabs.com/?s=red5
